scripts.scrape: prisma generate && prisma migrate dev && node scraper/scraper.js && node scraper/save-to-db.js && node scraper/countCars.js && npx prisma db execute --file reclaim-db-space.sql && node export-cars-from-db.js && node update-index-html-with-new-cars.js
scripts.db:save: node scraper/save-to-db.js && node scraper/countCars.js && npx prisma db execute --file reclaim-db-space.sql
